title: 04/23/2021 - HOUR 2 - Drew Brees, Eric Mangini and NFL Draft Comparisons
itunes:title: 04/23/2021 - HOUR 2 - Drew Brees, Eric Mangini and NFL Draft Comparisons
description:
Newly retired NFL QB Drew Brees joins Colin to talk about his amazing career and what's next. The Man-Genius, Eric Mangini drops in to break down the NFL Draft. And Colin compares the current NFL Draft prospects to Academy Award winning movies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
